subject: College Athletics
Football (College)
Bowl Games
Football
Fiesta Bowl
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A.’s Division I board of directors on Thursday approved a new task force to look at the criteria and process for licensing bowls, and will not approve any new games until updated standards are put in place.
snippet: The N.C.A.A.’s Division I board of directors on Thursday approved a new task force to look at the criteria and process for licensing bowls, and will not approve any new games until updated standards are put in place.
